name: emoji-short-name
description: An `{emoji: 'Short Name'}` dictionary directly from https://unicode.org/

scripts.build: npm i emoji-essential@latest && node build.js && npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm test
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/index.js && echo 'module.exports = emojiShortName;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/index.js && echo 'export default emojiShortName;' >> esm/index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
